item.description:
Hi everyone,

I have been working recently with Kaji Aso Studio to form a stronger connection between our groups. Started by Kaji Aso over 25 years ago, the studio promotes Japanese and Western cultural connections through visual arts, poetry, music, philosophy, and other Japanese cultural events.

Kaji Aso will be having an open house this Saturday from 6:00 - 8:30 pm (please see their message below) that I highly encourage many of you to attend. If you are interested in finding new connections to Japan outside of your current language studies and social connections, this may be the place for you!

Also, please note, those that first time students that attend the open house this Saturday eve will be provided an additional 10% discount on upcoming classes.

-------

ART CLASSES
at Kaji Aso Studio

Please come visit our
OPEN HOUSE
with FACULTY EXHIBITION

Saturday, Sept 18 from 6-8:30pm

Drop by! Meet some faculty, get a quick tour, learn about classes

*Students and Seniors receive a 15% DISCOUNT on classes
*Register on Sept 18th for a SPECIAL ADDITIONAL10% DISCOUNT this day only
(First time students only)

Kaji Aso Studio
40 St. Stephen Street
Boston MA 02115
www.kajiasostudio.com
617-247-1719
item.name: Kaji Aso Studio - Open House
